text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) is not the only compliance method under the Electricity at Work Regulations 1989. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this in Section 1.4: \"While PAT testing is not itself a specific statutory requirement (it is a means of compliance rather than a legal obligation in its own right), the duty to maintain electrical equipment safely is absolute in terms of the obligation, qualified only by reasonable practicability.\" This directly satisfies the requirement.", "criterion_id": "8f03071f-4174-476a-aaad-a897fa9c3bfb"}
